pkgmetadata.longdescription: # numpy-sugar[![Documentation](https://readthedocs.org/projects/numpy-sugar/badge/?version=latest)](https://numpy-sugar.readthedocs.io/en/latest/?badge=latest)Missing NumPy functionalities.## InstallEnter```bashpip3 install numpy-sugar```from the command-line.## Running the testsEnter```pythonpython3 -c "import numpy_sugar; numpy_sugar.test()"```## Authors* [Danilo Horta](https://github.com/horta)## LicenseThis project is licensed under the [MIT License](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/limix/numpy-sugar/master/LICENSE.md).
